website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if your dog prefers salmon and you don't mind the fishy smell.
pros: Salmon strips that are the perfect bite-size
Contains 90% meat and no corn, soy, or wheat
Also a good source of Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids
cons: They have a strong, fishy odor, and tend to be crumbly
Consumers who break them for smaller dogs complain about all the small pieces as a result

customer_reviews.title: Fraud!
customer_reviews.text: FRAUD- do not buy ! These treats are not Plato USA! The color is off and the SKU is inconsistent with the actual Plato manufacturer. These might be expired with a fraudulent repacking SKU
customer_reviews.author: Kingston’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Crumbled bag, strips were brittle like they had previously been wet
customer_reviews.text: I should have requested a return or at least taken pics but honestly I was so upset I just threw it away. The bag looked and felt like it had been wadded up and reused. The strips inside were brittle and crumbled in my hand - almost like the whole thing had been wet at some point. I've bought these treats at a local store and my dog loves them - I've never seen them with the consistency of what was inside this package. Lesson learned - I'll keep buying this at my local store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Expired by a year
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package. They are supposed to be soft chews. I noticed that they were all hard. I looked at the expiration date and it is September 25, 2016. If I'm paying this much for a dog treat, I would expect it to be fresh. This is the first time this has happened, but it is also the last. I'll buy them locally even if it costs a little more. At least I can look at the expiration date before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Yiqqahah

customer_reviews.title: Recall
customer_reviews.text: Plato recalled their salmon treats in Feb. Why didn’t they announce it or try to contact customers? I fed these to my sweet pup and she stated itching and acting weird. Now, the vet says she’s having liver problems. I suspect these were tainted. Don’t know how to find out or have them tested.
customer_reviews.author: KBidder

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before and have loved them. I thought the treats in this bagged looked funny but wasn’t sure till I finally compared side by side to another bag and the ones I received from Amazon are definitely not right. They are light colored, dry and crumbly. They are not expired so I don’t know why they are like this and am worried I have been feeding my dog something bad for her. It is past the deadline to return. I am not happy I wasted money on these. They are not cheap treats. I would give this batch 0 stars for freshness if I could.
customer_reviews.author: trac2

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats! He wanted to write the review but couldn't, so I'll type what he says: the bag could be bigger with more treats in it, don't even worry about making it resealable next time, just leave it open, no they're not stinky what are you talking about (I said they stink...well they're fish after all) they're easy to break up to small pieces but why would you do that. Okay, this sums it up
customer_reviews.author: zssss

customer_reviews.title: Great texture and ingredients. Salmon flavor can be a bit fishy.
customer_reviews.text: The salmon flavored treats are great. They are made with high quality ingredients. They hold their shape, even when stuck into pockets. They are soft enough to be broken into pieces, which is great for training purposes. They are a bit "fishy" smelling, which is to be expected for high quality fish treats... but needs to be said in case you are weak stomached ;). I have definitely smelled worse/fishier treats! The dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Beagle approved!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most rancid smelling treats that I've used to date and it is my Beagle's favorite treat of all time!!! I can get her to do anything with these in hand. I'm training a working pup and we can walk through a wooded area with fun criters to chase and lots of poop to roll in and she will always keep one eye on me and one nostril on the treats while working off lead! Never though the day would come. You should double bag this once it's open because the stink will make paint peel right off the walls. Yuck! They are high in fat so you can expect stink puppy farts later too.
customer_reviews.author: sheri keiko

customer_reviews.title: The dog has decided that she didn't like this batch.
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this product before but I do not remember from which vendor. Our dog normally loves these dog treats but the two bags that we received looked and smelt burnt. The dog wouldn't eat them which is rare for a dog to turn down food.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: It is OK.
customer_reviews.text: We used product for some time with no problems. The last bag had a large amount of unusable product becau mixture was dried out and crushed into fine powder. It is expensive with that kind of waste.
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: and their size makes them a good (small) meal replacement for sick or finicky dogs
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly healthy treats, and their size makes them a good (small) meal replacement for sick or finicky dogs. My dog has acid reflux in the mornings sometimes, and feels really unwell, so she sometimes won't eat breakfast. Occasionally she won't eat for 24 hours. She will always have two or three of these though, so at least I know she is getting salmon in her and not nothing at all. And often if she eats a few of these, it will calm her stomach and kick-start her appetite so she will end up eating a full meal.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for years because I like the ingredients and the fact they are manufactured in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years because I like the ingredients and the fact they are manufactured in the USA. However this last batch (three 16 oz packages) are very different from previous batches. This has caused me to trust the consistency and/or veracity of the listed ingredients. Previous treats had a very distinct and strong odor. Previous treats were soft and crumbly. Previous treats were very dark reddish-brown. the current batch barely has an odor. They are hard. They are pale tan in color. I have contacted Plato at info@platopettreats.com and have not yet received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Hervieux

customer_reviews.title: Yummy yummy they got lovin' in their tummy!
customer_reviews.text: So, I was skeptical at first. I am from a Mexican family that always said never feed fish to dogs because they would lose their hair. So I bought these to give to my Yorkie, Golden Retriever, and my Mom's chihuahuas. The smell is not too bad. Your hands smell like a day of handling Mackerel that you catch down at the Redondo Beach pier. But what matters is that my dogs love it. This is literally like crack to them. They start jonesing randomly throughout the day for some. Im sure if they could speak English they would tell me to quit holding out on them. You buy now! Dogs love you long time after!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Used to be better
customer_reviews.text: I used to order these regularly and they weren't nearly as hard. My dog's can't even chew them now. Disappointed. Won't be ordering again. I hope they didn't change the chicken ones, too!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer aselin

customer_reviews.title: 90 % Salmon - Our favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased these because of their high Salmon & Omega content. Although these are "stinky", these are my Bulldog's favorite treat ever; she loses her mind when I hide a salmon treat in her Kong ball. The Omega's make her coat shiny and are hopefully good for her heart. No matter, I will keep buying these. I've tried other brands of Salmon treats, but this is the only one that gets Boggie crazy once I open the bag (which I keep on TOP of the fridge or in the freezer! she would tear up the house to get her paws on a bag of these!) Recommend to try!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves the Natural Salmon Plato Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these treats. We save them and she gets one after her morning walk. She knows it and sits by the pantry door until she receives her treat each morning. I've purchased them several times.
customer_reviews.author: balldt

customer_reviews.title: Order some your dog will love them
customer_reviews.text: My Dog cannot stop wagging her tail when I pull these out. My dog is also beginning to think that every delivery from Amazon is something for her. All I can say is thank goodness she can't order from Alexa - I would be in trouble and have a house full of doggy treats! All the treats we have order from Plato have been great, that is from Annie my dog!
customer_reviews.author: C. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Dog enjoy's it, but peices are too large and messy to break down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Corgi, and I would say he definitely approves! The ingredients are solid. They do smell quite strong; but its reasonable, and I'm sure that's exactly why he likes them. My only issue with these is that the pieces are HUGE. If you have a small/medium breed or puppy you will definitely have to break them apart into smaller pieces. I would typically not mind doing that, but these treats are quite hard and cause one heck of mess of crumbs in the process. If this same product had an option for smaller pieces it would have gotten a 5/5 from me.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product That Dogs Will Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog will do anything for these Salmon Treats. I love that they are made in the USA!! I would not hesitate to try these treats as I am certain your dog will love them as much as mine does. The fact that they are all natural is a huge plus in my book. I also give my dog the duck treats from Plato and he loves them as well. The duck ones are great if your dog suffers from food or skin allergies, the duck treats will not induce itching! I will purchase another variety of these treats the next time I place an order. I am sure he will love anything Plato makes!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaggieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Salmon Strips are now Salmon Recipe
customer_reviews.text: My Airedales LOVE these treats, and we buy Plato because we trust their process. However, something changed. There has been a subtle product change from SALMON STRIPS to SALMON RECIPE. The new formula seems over-cooked and when I am water training, the new “recipe” doesn’t always float. The dogs still love the salmon more than anything else and will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: It has ingredients that are safe for a cocker spaniel with a sensitive stomach. I like that the salmon ones are harder so that they don't turn into crumbs in the bottom of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Californian

customer_reviews.title: Defective and won’t exchange or issue refund
customer_reviews.text: My dog normally loves these Plato salmon treats. I received my most recent order and there was obviously something wrong. On the left is what I received from Amazon. It does not smell right either. On the right is what it usually looks like. Amazon said it was ineligible for a return or credit!
customer_reviews.author: carla oates

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Treat
customer_reviews.text: My Boston Terrier LOVES these. He can be asleep in the upstairs bedroom and come running if he even hears me even touch the bag! They are smelly, but totally worth it because he loves them so much. He is normally picky about treats because he is so spoiled, and I make him so many homemade ones (milkbones? he won't put the things in his mouth), but he cannot get enough of these. It is a plus that they are made in America and healthier for him than other treats. My boyfriends family also has two Dachshunds and they go insane over these as well. Also, my roommate's Shihpoo goes crazy when he smells them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My dog's absolute favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product my dog will get so excited over he actually twirls, spins, shakes hand, sits up, and "silent barks" for. We taught him how to actually whisper a bark! He LOVES these Salmon Strips and, truthfully, they smell good enough for human consumption. Thanks for making a very nutritional snack/treat. My dog gives you a 5+ paws!
customer_reviews.author: Ms67GTO

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: Now on my 3rd package and my dog absolutely loves this product. Don't get it too close to your nose because it definitely has an odor, but it makes my dog very excited when she smells it. I store the product in an air-tight container. I selected this product due to the natural ingredients. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive tummy? - this is a treat with no side-effects
customer_reviews.text: This was an item on the wish list of a Weimaraner rescue group I support. Given Weims have uber sensitive tummies, I was wondering if these would upset their stomachs. NOPE! They loved getting a very special treat and no side effects. So, I got some for my Weim as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. KeeganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have severe allergies and can only consume duck, salmon, white fish and potatoes. Needless to say, finding treats they can eat is challenging. We bought these and the duck strips and I believe it is fair to say that they would jump through burning rings to get to these. My female leaps two feet off the floor when these are offered. I just re-ordered these treats. They are pure salmon with no filler, no corn product, no beef/chicken product...very healthy and they have nice shiny coats from the salmon oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger in L.A.

customer_reviews.title: One down side is that the smell is terrible. I love all kinds of fish
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a hound mix and was never interested in taking treats outside, so I searched online for the smelliest treats I could find. These work so well! He goes crazy for them! This actually got him more interested in taking other treats outside too. I swear by these now. One down side is that the smell is terrible. I love all kinds of fish. I even love sardines. These though, smell like dead fermenting fish. I usually take out a few at a time and put them in a ziplock bag so I don't have to open the big bag all the time.
customer_reviews.author: C M Riccardi

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog likes, but doesn't crave this treat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tread for a 9 year old rescue Westie that is rather discriminating on what he will eat. And, being a Westie, I have to be careful about what I feed him due to allergic reactions to food. This treat was liked with interest for about the first 1/3 of the bag, he is small and gets only about 1/3 of a piece per offering. He is now acting a little be bored with the treat... maybe his interest will come back if he isn't offered any for a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry_NJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Even those are quite smelly, my dog loves them! It is her treat at lunchtime. When she sees me going towards them she runs to me and promptly sits down. Then she runs off to savor it. Will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: harleygal

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but the odor........
customer_reviews.text: Quality and value are very good. However, the salmon strips really stink like, well, stinky fish. And although my dog loved them, her intestines did not. She exploded in the middle of the night. It was ugly. My bad - too much, too soon. Because of the odor and my dog's explosion, we tossed out the remainder of the bag. This is unfortunate because it is so difficult to find made in USA dog treats that are sensibly priced.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Will probably sprinkle the crumbs over her food so they're not wasted. Ordered the Plato duck strips the last time
customer_reviews.text: Lily loves these treats. A little crumbly when you get to the bottom of the package. Will probably sprinkle the crumbs over her food so they're not wasted. Ordered the Plato duck strips the last time. They seem a little more firm. She loves both.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are the smelliest, most coveted, most wonderful dog treats I have ever tried for my 4 dogs. They are a crunchy small rectangular shaped biscuit that cannot be broken in half easily. My dogs absolutely go into some kind of frenzy when I bring out this bag. They are usually very content to take turns getting their treats but these set them off in a tizzy with everybody whining and jumping and pawing to be the first one to get this stinky cracker! They absolutely LOVE them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Parks

customer_reviews.title: They are all natural which I liked. The price is steep though and on my ...
customer_reviews.text: My boy sure paid attention with these treats in my pocket. They are all natural which I liked. The price is steep though and on my budget are a special treat we afford just a few times a year
customer_reviews.author: paul m.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: I hold my nose when I open the bag, first ingredient is salmon and in in the ingredient label and is 90% salmon according to the manufacturer. I've purchases this treat several times and they don't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: "Salmon Strips" is a misleading headline.
customer_reviews.text: When I read "salmon strips" I had a completely different impression of what I was about to witness. At first I was disappointed that I was not being treated to a slow striptease by a large fish, but the more I thought about it the more I realized I wouldn't really want to see that anyway. Fortunately, the dogs love it. All has been redeemed.
customer_reviews.author: Zann Cannon Goff

customer_reviews.title: Dog and I are both happy
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Salmon, the Duck and the Chicken strips. Our JRT is very fussy and horribly spoiled. She turns up her nose and walks away from many treats I've tried. Most of the "organic" or "healthy" treats I've tried haven't won her over. She just had one each of the Salmon, Duck and Chicken and LOVED all of them! I'm thrilled that they are made in the US and contain ingredients I approve of. Thank you Plato and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: These dog treats are the BEST. They smell strongly of salmon
customer_reviews.text: These dog treats are the BEST. They smell strongly of salmon, even just opening the bag is a sensory experience. Our dog loves these treats so much we have used them for training for one specific behavior - running away after escaping out the front door. Because we call these "salmon" instead of "treat" we merely have to offer a "salmon" to have her return at a full gallop from halfway down the block.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Stink but I guess dogs like the smell. It didn't cause my dog itchy or allergy react (I'm very carefully feeding my dog one piece a day at the beginning just want to make sure she is ok with this snack because she tends to allergic to a lots of dog treats), I am sure I will buy again as long as my beagle loves it
customer_reviews.author: Peace in SF

customer_reviews.title: Salmon --great training treat!!
customer_reviews.text: The Plato Salmon strips arrived just fine. My dog likes them and they make great training treats. They don't upset his tummy as many do. For treats, I cut them into about 6 pieces so they go along way. I use these and Plato Duck treats are also very good. Yup! We are happy with the product, with the seller --We've Gotta Deal 4 U---who sold them through Amazon--I save lots of gas too, by shopping on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: So Great!
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie-poo loves these snacks. She asks for them constantly. Great size for a treat as well; not too big and not too small. You get a great amount in the bag as well. Seems very full. Doesn't smell fishy either. Will be purchasing for life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dog Crack!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as a training treat. This is like dog crack! They went through all the motions trying to get one. I just had to take them out and they started doing their tricks and showing off.
customer_reviews.author: Madladluc

customer_reviews.title: Beware salmon smell
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these but they have the most GODAWFUL smell. Opening the bag is enough to stink up a small room and the pungent fish odor doesn't wipe off your hands, it has to be washed off – vigorously – with soap. We'll skip the salmon next time and stick with the other flavors of Plato treats, which the dogs love equally as much and which don't require a hazmat suit to handle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn't one to turn down treats, but these might actually be his favorite. They are pretty stinky, though, so I usually have to wash my hands after handling them. They are solid, but not crunchy, so they can be broken into smaller pieces with moderate effort if necessary. But I just give my 55 lb dog the whole strip as an occasional treat. He knows the bag and gets super excited whenever I take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Veritasliberat

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing for my gig!! She loves these treats. She is allergic for chicken and byproducts. It smells good and easy to break to make smaller pieces. Woof woof
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, my dog is allergic to chicken and it's hard to find a product without chicken as a filler. He loves these treats and they certainly smell like Salmon. I have always received there products on time and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Too big and can't break apart without making a mess
customer_reviews.text: I thought these treats would be softer like Plato's Small Bites. Unfortunately, these treats are HUGE and CRUMBLY. You can break them apart, but they crumble into treat-dust. If you have a small to medium dog, I'd skip these if you're using them for training treats.
customer_reviews.author: Couper

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5-pound toy poodle who has food allergies, so I have to be careful about treats and diet in general. A local health food store for pets recommended these treats for their omega-3 content and palatability. My dog cannot get enough of these -- he LOVES them! The strips are fairly large but easy to break up into pencil eraser-sized pieces for my little dog. Treats that my dog loves *and* that are good for him? Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best smelly treats ever!
customer_reviews.text: Although I also use the Duck, the Salmon treats are the best! I do water therapy in an underwater treadmill, and even dogs who love water are some times intimidated at first, and these are a healthy incentive. These are so smelly, dogs search for them in the treadmill area. They are also high quality. It would be great if they came in a smaller size--I pinch off pieces, but they crumble that way. Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: He first got some from a nice lady at the store
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these. He first got some from a nice lady at the store. I bought him a bag there but the price was pretty steep. The price here is more reasonable. My puppy is a large German Shepherd so he eats a lot of food and treats. He can't get enough of these treats, they're definitely his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Elli B

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love these!
customer_reviews.text: These were easily my dog's favorite treats. In fact, when I carried them in my pocket during walks every dog I encountered tried to stick its nose into my pocket (so beware - they are super stinky). Chloe had a super sensitive stomach and a lot of food allergies but she tolerated these well since they are so few ingredients. YA!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: My dog's absolute favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells super strongly of fish. It even leaves residual smell on your hands to where I have to wash my hands immediately after giving this to my dog. With that said, my dog loves these! At night, as soon as she comes in the door she will head straight to her room...she will not do that if I put another treat in her bowl. I also appreciate that these are made in America and made with quality ingredients. I will be a repeat customer of these!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Vines

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like them almost as much as hot dogs, but shelf stable!
customer_reviews.text: A great high-value treat. Dogs seem universally crazy about these, and they don't need to be refrigerated. I break them into tiny pieces and use them for training treats. (They will make your hands stink, though, so be warned!) Great for K9 Nosework in the introductory hunting and pairing stages.
customer_reviews.author: Citydog

customer_reviews.title: since she's excited I'm excited and pleased to say goodbye to beggin's for a healthier crack ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried crack but I hear its addictive- that is the same affect these snacks have on my baby. She has litterally bumped her head on a wall turning around in excitement to get at these snacks. Ergo, since she's excited I'm excited and pleased to say goodbye to beggin's for a healthier crack lifestyle- lol
customer_reviews.author: Ketara

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but....
customer_reviews.text: My big mutt dog LOVES these treats and I make sure to never run out. My only disappointment is that each bag contains a lot of crumbs and broken up pieces. I sprinkle this on my dogs food so it still gets enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Likens

customer_reviews.title: Plato Salmon, 16-Ounce
customer_reviews.text: While it may not be pure salmon, a china supply of chicken made our dog sick and the Vet bills were a lot. We only buy Made In America because of our standards. These salmon bits are a winner... Our dog (Sharpie) really loves these bites and they are at a reasonable price. I highly recommend for treats only and when you are training your dog on a daily basis. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: The dogs did like them but we gave half the bag away
customer_reviews.text: These are so smelly - not even something I would want to keep in my kitchen. The dogs did like them but we gave half the bag away. It's not all salmon like the other stuff we buy. Think we would rather make our own treats than buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this treat
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love this treat. They would probably eat the whole bag if allowed. Can't give them as much as they used to have because they are seniors and have to watch their weight and protein level due to medical issues. They are happy to get a piece every now and then!
customer_reviews.author: bheiser

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: We use these Salmon treats regularly for my two sheepdogs. They absolutely LOVE these. You can break them up so can be used as a smaller treat when training. But a warning...they are smelly and when left in your pocket, you will be smelly too! LOL! That is why they are so attractive to the dogs. Recommend highly for your special furry friend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. My only complaint is that they should make some larger size ones. I have a border collie/lab mix, about 75 pounds, and he just gulps these down. We still give them to him, as they really do help his skin problems. From our experience with other treats, if they were larger, he would chew them and enjoy them more.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn McNamee

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS BAD but my dogs LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the worst smelling dog treats EVER. They have a strong fishy smell (hence the use of real Salmon), however, my dogs LOVE them. They were actually recommended to me since I have a Husky and he has skin problems, as most Huskies do. They don't seem to cure the problem areas of his skin, however, they do help a little. These are probably my dogs' favorite treats!
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sniffing!
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love it!!! they are very very stinky though, ...it might explain why my mutts go crazy over these! It was love at first sniffing! They are not too crunchy nor too chewy. Perfect to stuff into a red-you-know-the-name dog toy! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Best dog treats out there!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this product. It seems I am now buying it by the truckload. It is a little stinky, but not unbearable - come on, it is fish. But the smell makes it all that much more enticing to the dogs (and mine are really picky). It is made in the USA with the finest ingredients, I really couldn't recommend more!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's incredibly dry and crumbly. And stinky, but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's incredibly dry and crumbly. And stinky, but I would be ok with that if I didnt get salmon crumbs everywhere when i break a treat in half. Will never buy the salmon strips again.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: A really like that they don't have that much ingredients and that ...
customer_reviews.text: A really like that they don't have that much ingredients and that they're made in the US but I put them in a Ziploc bag and I thought that was supposed to keep them fresh but it didn't they are hard now and I don't think my dog likes them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Countryheart26

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treat and I love the price about $3.00 less than All the best Pets. Unfortunately, previously when I have order the chicken treats they have arrived dried up; the salmon treats "this time" were perfect. Would I order these again? Maybe if I need to fill out my order for the free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these. We originally bought these when she was taking a tracking class since we needed something super stinky to get her use to finding items. They worked great for that and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My pup's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My lil dog loves these treats. They are easy to break up into smaller chunks, so the bag lasts forever. Keep it zipped up, though, because these treats will dry out. The treats make my hands smell pretty fishy, but the dog loves 'em! Originally, we bought these treats at the local pet shop, but the amazon price was just enough to round my order out for super saver shipping.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Renz

customer_reviews.title: Second order of these treats
customer_reviews.text: I buy the salmon flavored for my dog. He loves them! As far as I can see, the ingredients are great. I put some of these in a Baggie, and brought them to the dog park.....I was like the pied piper,...dogs from everywhere started following me. The treats are very very very stinky,....but I guess that's becuz they are 90 % salmon.
customer_reviews.author: CHOCOLATEDOG

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure that these treats are delicious for dogs, after all I read many great reviews, but my picky 15 year old lab who loves smelly salmon treats from China wouldn't touch them. Neither would my Tibetan spaniel. Had to give them away. I was hoping to replace those China treats! Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: MY DOGS LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 allergy dogs and they do great on these treats!! Well worth the money spent!! When ordering these, I understood they would smell like Salmon (duh-it's a stinky fish) but to be honest, the smell wasn't nearly what I thought. Glad I didn't listen to the other reviews saying how bad and gagging the smell was because it's not. My dogs can have diarrhea issues from new treats but didn't on these!! Definitely recommend and they're made in the USA...can't go wrong with that!!
customer_reviews.author: THERESA A Kish

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOG TREAT
customer_reviews.text: PLATO has the BEST dog treats. My Frenchie loves them and my friends 4 dogs love them. They are a bit higher in price but they are made better than most of the dog treats out there. Will not stop buying them for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: be prepared for the SMELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE plato products.......however the arms from these I couldn't take after a day and gave them away, My dogs loved them,,,,,,but went back to the chicken ones.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for her dogs birthday. Her pup loved them.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husky/basset hound loves fishy smelling treats - and he LOVES these! They are a bit pricey, so I really ration the treats out. But it seems to be good quality and plenty fishy smelling for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Out dog loves salmon strip treats!
customer_reviews.text: The Plato salmon strips are a healthy treat. We use them for training and rewards. They are a good value from this supplier. Also, the strips contain oils, which are good for our young dog's fur and skin. I also give them to my daughter's three dogs when I take care of them for her, and they look forward to seeing my and my package of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S. Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves her salmon! I think the bag was old, though, because a lot of it crumbled or broke when picked up. I'll try a different company.
customer_reviews.author: RavenzFthr

customer_reviews.title: stinky tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: My pug love fish. This salmon treat is one of her favorite but at she won't even touch it. The salmon treat do smell fishy and if not eating right away it will stink up the place. I give her that option to eat it but I won't leave it out in the room.
customer_reviews.author: N Vo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Healthy Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: I have been order the Plato Salmon Dog Treats for quite some time. My dog has bad allergies and can only eat a fish and potato diet. She loves these treats. I can never find these at the pet stores and my local feed store stopped carrying them, so I am very happy I can get them on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Hazlett

customer_reviews.title: The best tasty dog treats
customer_reviews.text: The best tasty dog treats, my dogs love them. Very smelly! I break them up into small pieces that I use for training. That is the only time the dogs get them. I spend too much money on Salmon Strips LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Value, freshness and my dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats - now I'm looking for the minnows
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Anderson

customer_reviews.title: so the Plato Salmon Strips are the perfect treat for her
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua is allergic to turkey and we are trying to avoid all poultry products for her, so the Plato Salmon Strips are the perfect treat for her. She loves the taste - and salmon has omega fatty acids which are good for her!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa98115

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys these Plato Treats salmon flavor more then the duck flavor
customer_reviews.author: Margo R.

customer_reviews.title: Best treats I have found for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Salmon treats from Plato - and all the other ones as well. The dogs really love them and I really like that they are from the USA and not China - which is getting very hard to find these days. Pretty soon I may have to exclusively make my dogs treats for them but until then I will buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gross

customer_reviews.title: Salmon strips
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them, but the product gave them diarrhea! I have to give them half a strip only. They come in a nice bag that is resealable. The smell of the salmon strips is strong that I have to wash my hands after giving my dogs a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Clalumelia

customer_reviews.title: Two Beagles loved these treats
customer_reviews.text: Two Beagles loved these treats. The bad part is humans have to snell it when opening the bag - seriously the dogs loved these treats. Ordered the same brand again but decided to try the duck this time. Great product for your dogs.
customer_reviews.author: maureen2455

customer_reviews.title: but we don't fine the smell all that bad (fishy yes
customer_reviews.text: the dog LOVES these. People complain that they stink, but we don't fine the smell all that bad (fishy yes, but not overly heinous). Excellent training treat - can be broken into small bits which are apparently irresistible.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie O. Siemer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these. I will pay more for dog treats ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these. I will pay more for dog treats that i know are good quality and safe. Taste test approved by all three rescue mutts !! Will buy again. I only wish they had discounts when buying in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Oscarspeople

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful treat
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 small dogs and this treat is crumbly so I can give them small pieces which is really great. I love giving salmon at a treat because its is so healthy for dogs (in small amounts of course). They really love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie O

customer_reviews.title: don't smell as bad and my dog likes them much better
customer_reviews.text: They were kind of hard, not sure if they're supposed to be and they smell soo fishy when I put them in my pocket. The chicken ones are softer, don't smell as bad and my dog likes them much better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it but the shipping is slower than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Was looking around at salon treats (good for dogs like mine who have sensitive skin) and after reading the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking around at salon treats (good for dogs like mine who have sensitive skin) and after reading the rave reviews I figured I had to give these a shot. Good thing I did, because they immediately became my dog's favorite treat. Now when I offer her anything else she looks at me with her "why can't I have the good ones? Don't you LOVE me???" eyes, so needless to say this is the bag I grab most often. They don't smell great, but that's a small sacrifice for a happy pooch. I suggest you try them!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bad customer service from Fat Happy Pets
customer_reviews.text: the treats in this bag were super dried out and broken into small pieces. I emailed the seller two times and they never bothered to respond to my emails.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought these would be a jerky strip--they are actually ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a jerky strip--they are actually a biscuit. My dog eats them, but not enthusiastically. They smell very fishy--I have to wash my hands each time I feed him one.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, yummy doggy treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not let the new dog walker get close enough to leash her. That is until I left these treats for him. Voila! They are now best friends and my problem is solved. The only down side is that they smell like something your dog rolled in ion the beach.
customer_reviews.author: alieye

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER
customer_reviews.text: MY BABY LOVES THESE. ALMOST AS MUCH A MERRICK'S LAMB LUNG.
customer_reviews.author: B. SCHNEIDER

customer_reviews.title: my buddy loves this treat
customer_reviews.text: I have bought different treats for my dog buddy. He loves this particular one very much. It is absolutely his favorite. I also bought the duck and chicken ones on the same order. But he is not interested in them at all. So I am going to stick to this treat and I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: good but stinks
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love them. But they stink to my husband and I. The whole room will stink up like fish within seconds. Buyer beware, give these treats outside, unless you like your rooms smelling like fish for the next 30 minutes. they are a healthy treat for dogs though.
customer_reviews.author: snow_white711

customer_reviews.title: Our two dogs love these. Salmon 90% content and smells like fish
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs love these. Salmon 90% content and smells like fish! Biscuits are basically small, but some longer than others which is nice depending on time of day - our third bad and will be buying more when these run out!
customer_reviews.author: jumper

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Haven't found a dog yet who doesn't like these. But I was hesitant to give it to one terrier we were babysitting who likes to snort her food for fear she might just swallow the thing whole since they pieces are small enough for her to not chew and possibly choke on. That said, my dog loves 'em.
customer_reviews.author: cgrrl

product_meta.title: PLATO Dog Treats - Salmon Real Strips
product_meta.description: Size:16 ozSalmon Real Strips have NO added sugars, artificial preservatives, by-products, artificial colors, protein-meals, soy, wheat, corn, fillers, or freeze-drying. These single-source novel protein treats are slow roasted in our very own US facility- especially good for dogs with skin issues, allergies, and food sensitivities. Flavors include duck, organic chicken, and pacific salmon. Gluten-free brown rice is the only grain. Supports digestion, healthy skin & coat, and circulation. Best Salmon dog treats
feature_bullets: Healthy Snack – Our Treats Have No Added Sugars, Artificial Preservatives, By-Products, Artificial Colors, Protein-Meals, Soy, Wheat, Corn, Fillers, Or Freeze-Drying.

Ingredients – Best All Natural Pet Treat On The Market. Plato Uses The Highest Percent Of Quality, Protein On The Market. Treats Are 90% Pure Meat. We Procure All Ingredients Straight From The Source. This Guarantees Plato Pet Treats Is The Most Healthy Dog Treat Made In The Usa.
Benefits & Recommendations– This Dog Snack Is Organic, Helps Digestion, Healthy Skin & Coat, And Circulation.
A Treat For Sensitive Pets - These Single-Source Novel Protein Treats Are Slow Roasted In Our Very Own Us Facility- Especially Good For Dogs With Skin Issues, Allergies, And Food Sensitivities.
Great For Training – Dogs Are Amazing, But Sometimes They Need A Little Training. One Of The Best Ways To Motivate Your Dog Or Puppy Is With A Treat That They Love! Canines Love Plato Dog Treats!

specifications.Manufacturer: KDR PET TREATS, LLC D.B.A. Plato Pet Treats
